verses.verse: These <WG3778> Therefore <WG3767> Having <WG2192> <WG3588> Promises, <WG1860> Beloved, <WG27> We Should Cleanse <WG2511> Ourselves <WG1438> From <WG575> Every <WG3956> Defilement <WG3436> Of Flesh <WG4561> And <WG2532> Spirit, <WG4151> Perfecting <WG2005> Holiness <WG42> In <WG1722> Fear <WG5401> Of God. <WG2316>

' But <WG235> He Who <WG3588> Encourages <WG3870> Those <WG3588> Brought Low <WG5011> Encouraged <WG3870> Us <WG2248> <WG3588> God <WG2316> By <WG1722> The <WG3588> Coming <WG3952> Of Titus; <WG5103>

<WG3756> <WG3440> And Not Only <WG1161> By <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG3952> His Coming, <WG846> But <WG235> Also <WG2532> By <WG1722> The <WG3588> Encouragement <WG3874> With Which <WG3739> He Was Encouraged <WG3870> ' As To <WG1909> You; <WG5213> Relating <WG312> To Us <WG2254> <WG3588> <WG5216> Your Longing, <WG1972> <WG3588> <WG5216> Your Mourning, <WG3602> <WG3588> <WG5216> Your Zeal <WG2205> For <WG5228> Me; <WG1700> <WG5620> So As For Me <WG3165> The More <WG3123> To Be Rejoiced. <WG5463>
